# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and unique features, it's worth more than $100 to us. Considering its true value and the benefits it offers, we're extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $120. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for high-quality products. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly exceptional. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
